H0.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. Mozart

H1.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. Rossini

H2.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. Donizetti

H3.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. VERDI

A4.text: Falstaff, Verdi's only comedy apart from the early, ill-fated Un giorno di regno.

A5.text: The last two operas, Otello and Falstaff, together with the Requiem and the Four Sacred Pieces, then represent a 'final' period.
